text: Ni ngankuwaga (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) m’masengo galigose, soni ngankusoomaga mwalakwemo chilichose cha m’Qur’an, soni (jenumanja achinawandu) ngankupanganyaga masengo galigose, ikaweje Uwwe tukuwaga Mboni pa jenumanja ndema jankujijilika nago, soni ngachikasasisika kwa Ambuje wenu (chindu) chausito wanti mpela lunyilili pasi kapena kwinani, soni namuno chamwana nnope kupunda chalakwecho kapena chakulilapo niikaweje chili m’chitabu chakusalichisya (chilichose Al-Lauh-Al-Mahfuz)
